recipe.title: Green Salad with Apple Dressing and Camembert Toasts
ingredients: 1 large Red Delicious apple, cored, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
8 thin diagonal baguette slices, lightly toasted
8 cups mixed salad greens (such as curly endive, romaine and radicchio; about 5 ounces)
instructions: Whisk vinegar and oil in large bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in apple. Let apple marinate at room temperature 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Spread Camembert cheese evenly over toasts, dividing equally. Add greens to apple dressing; toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Divide among plates and serve with cheese toasts.

Spread Camembert cheese evenly over toasts, dividing equally.
Add greens to apple dressing; toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Divide among plates and serve with cheese toasts.
